Name: Marble Pop Paradise
About the game: Over 20,000 players have enjoyed our game so far! We hope you do too. Please let us know what you would like to see included in future updates. Experience Realistic Landscapes Engage with ten different, interactive environments, from stunning arctic glaciers to rolling grassy hills to serene ocean islands. Enjoy Music & Videos Listen to your favourite music, throw on a new podcast, surf the web or watch Youtube all while playing. Relieve Stress With Marble Pop Challenges The marble-pop goals offer players a stimulating, low-pressure change in focus from their everyday routines. Complete levels and unlock new special marbles and special abilities. Accessible For All Types Of Players While easy enough for beginners to pick up and start playing, players looking for more of a challenge can change their shooting angles and positions, customizing the physical effort and marksmanship needed for each shot.
